data.comment: Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Emil Hansson.
In the minute 6, Zian Flemming instrumental with a fine assist.
Samuel Moutoussamy (Sittard) has replaced the possibly injured Jorrit Smeets.
Jaroslaw Jach blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-1.
In the minute 45, Goal! George Cox gives Sittard a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 46, Kenneth Paal is replacing Rico Strieder for the away team.
Martin Angha (Sittard) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Thomas Lam equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Tesfaldet Tekie with Lisandro Semedo.
Jesper Drost is on a sub for Mustafa Saymak for Zwolle.
Lazaros Rota is booked for the home team.
In the minute 84, Zwolle make their third substitution with Reza Ghoochannejhad replacing Mike Van Duinen.
Branislav Ninaj is on a sub for Jaroslaw Jach for Sittard.
Sittard make their fourth substitution with Nassim El Ablak replacing Emil Hansson.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
